price: ߊ߬ ߕߐ߰ߡߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߦߊ߬ߣߍ߲ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߓߘߊ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߊ߲߫ ߖߊ߲߬ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ߒߕߋ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ( ߝߟߐ߫ )
arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا هِيَ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِبَعِيدٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: musawwamatan ʿinda rabbika wamā hiya mina al-ẓālimīna bibaʿīdin
